meanings.sent1: The candy bar was left unwrapped on the table.
meanings.sent2: The gift remained unwrapped under the tree.
meanings.sent3: The unwrapped present caught the attention of the curious cat.
meanings.sent4: The unwrapped box revealed its contents to everyone.
meanings.sent5: The unwrapped umbrella got soaked in the rain.

meanings.definition: To remove the wrapping from something
meanings.sent1: She unwrapped the chocolate bar and took a bite.
meanings.sent2: He unwrapped the birthday present with excitement.
meanings.sent3: The magician unwrapped the scarf to reveal a dove.
meanings.sent4: The detective unwrapped the mystery to find the culprit.
meanings.sent5: The child unwrapped the toy and played with it joyfully.
